data.actual_result: The scrollbar is behind empty spaces made by sticky header.
data.expected_result: The scrollbar keeps on the top, can be seen all time
data.short_description: Sticky headers on member list blocks scrollbar view
data.steps_to_repro: - Be sure to have Discord app version 6.8.1 or above - Open a member list from server that has multiple roles - To make it apparent, make sure the top roles only has few members - Scroll the member list carefully and observe the scrollbar
